summary: This is my very first mod, just a quick retexure of the Drunken Huntsman sign in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Hi

This is my very first mod I\'m realeasing, it is just a simple retexture of the Drunken Huntsman sign in Whiterun, I always thought the sign almost looked black and white and needed a bit more color, I have done this but tried to keep it looking weathered to give it a more authentic look as though it\'s been there for some time.

I appreciate any comments you guys would like to give as I\'m still learning and would like your honest opinions.

Thank goes to Bethesda Softworks for creating such a great game, please contact me if you would to use this in your own mod.

I have now uploaded a version of the sign that is not as bright as a few people commented that is was a little bright, hope you guys like this better, and thanks again for all your comments.
Thanks also to the Nexus for being such a good community site and to all you guys who are members.
author: Unicornarian
